name: Hexon
description:
A relaxing puzzle game. Turn on each board by connecting all magnetic pieces to it.

HexON is a relaxing puzzle game where you connect magnetic pieces to a hexagonal board.

In each level you have a different board and set of pieces. You need to plug all pieces to the board to complete each level. No piece can be left unplugged.

  • 40 hand-crafted levels;
  • Original soundtrack to help you relax while solving the puzzles;
  • A game for everyone who likes jigsaw puzzles and gridlock games;

Can you find out the exact configuration that will complete the board?
